    Program Committee

    • José Fortes, Professor and Director, Advanced Computing and Information Systems Laboratory (ACIS Lab), University of Florida, USA

    • Fang-Pang Lin, Senior Research Fellow, Cloud Computing and System Integration Division and Center of Excellence for Cyber Enablement of Applications (CECEA), National Center for High-Performance Computing, Taiwan and

    • Shinji Shimojo, Professor and Director of Cybermedia Center, Osaka University and National Institute of Information and Communications Technology (NICT), Japan
    • Rui Oliveira, Associate Professor at the Informatics Department of University of Minho and Member of the Administration Board of the Institute for Systems and Computer Engineering, Technology and Science (INESC TEC), Portugal

    Local Organizing Committee

    National Institute of Information and Communications Technology (NICT): Koichi Fujinuma, Masanori Goto, Eiji Kawai, Masako Yoshida and team. (Please note that the list of Local Organizing Committee is not yet complete. More information will be added as the planning develops.)
